snippet: At the Dubai Airshow, the Pakistan Aeronautical Complex, which jointly produces the JF-17 fighter with a Chinese company, made clear its ambitions to sell the jet to other countries.
abstract: At the Dubai Airshow, the Pakistan Aeronautical Complex, which jointly produces the JF-17 fighter with a Chinese company, made clear its ambitions to sell the jet to other countries.

headline.main: Pakistan Has Export Plans for Jet Fighter Produced With China
